entry.name: mouseout
entry.title: .mouseout()
entry.desc: Bind an event handler to the "mouseout" event, or trigger that event on an element.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

argument.name: eventData
argument.desc: An object containing data that will be passed to the event handler.

argument.name: handler
argument.desc: A function to execute each time the event is triggered.

div.p: Instead of .mouseout( handler ) or .mouseout( eventData, handler ), use .on( "mouseout", handler ) or .on( "mouseout", eventData, handler ), respectively.
